title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti until al dente.
Combine pasta, bacon, and egg mixture.
Season with black pepper and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices.
Prepare masala sauce in a pan.
Add chicken to sauce and simmer.

title: Beef Stir Fry
summary: Quick and flavorful beef cooked with mixed vegetables and soy sauce.
instructions: Pour in soy sauce and mix well.
